mapper.insert: insert into reward_detail_info (phone_no,reward_score_type,detail_info,reward_score,create_time,modify_time) values (#{phoneNo}, #{rewardScoreType}, #{detailInfo}, #{rewardScore}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select count(1) from reward_detail_info where phone_no = #{phoneNo}

select reward_score_type rewardScoreType ,detail_info detailInfo,reward_score rewardScore,create_time createTime from reward_detail_info where phone_no = #{phoneNo} order by id desc limit #{pageNumber},10
